empty.title: All Good!
empty.description: Your crops are healthy. No actions needed right now.

criticalLow.title: üö® Water {{cropName}} NOW
criticalLow.description: Soil moisture is critically low at {{value}}{{unit}}. Your crop is at risk of severe stress.
criticalLow.reason: Moisture below {{optimalMin}}% causes wilting, stunted growth, and potential crop loss.
criticalLow.impact: Immediate watering can prevent irreversible damage

warningLow.title: üíß Schedule watering for {{cropName}}
warningLow.description: Moisture at {{value}}{{unit}} is below optimal. Water within the next few hours.
warningLow.reason: Current level is approaching stress territory. Optimal range is {{optimalMin}}-{{optimalMax}}%.
warningLow.impact: Early watering improves crop health and yield

criticalHigh.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Check drainage - Overwatering detected
criticalHigh.description: Moisture at {{value}}{{unit}} is too high. Risk of root rot and disease.
criticalHigh.reason: Excess water suffocates roots and promotes fungal growth.
criticalHigh.impact: Improve drainage to save your crop

optimal.title: ‚úÖ {{cropName}} moisture is perfect
optimal.description: Soil moisture at {{value}}{{unit}} is within optimal range.
optimal.reason: Your irrigation schedule is working well.

criticalLow.title: ‚ùÑÔ∏è Frost Alert - Protect {{cropName}}
criticalLow.description: Temperature at {{value}}{{unit}} is dangerously low. Risk of frost damage.
criticalLow.reason: Temperatures below {{optimalMin}}¬∞C can freeze plant cells and kill tissue.
criticalLow.impact: Cover crops or activate heating immediately

criticalHigh.title: üå°Ô∏è Heat Stress - Cool {{cropName}}
criticalHigh.description: Temperature at {{value}}{{unit}} is too high. Crops are stressed.
criticalHigh.reason: High temperatures cause wilting, sunburn, and reduced growth.

warningLow.title: üå°Ô∏è Temperature dropping for {{cropName}}
warningLow.description: Temperature at {{value}}{{unit}} is below optimal but not critical.
warningLow.reason: Cool temperatures slow growth but aren't immediately harmful.
warningLow.impact: Monitor closely and prepare protection if needed

criticalHigh.title: üí® High humidity - Improve ventilation
criticalHigh.description: Humidity at {{value}}{{unit}} increases disease risk for {{cropName}}.
criticalHigh.reason: High humidity promotes fungal diseases like powdery mildew and blight.
criticalHigh.impact: Increase airflow to reduce disease pressure

criticalLow.title: üí¶ Low humidity - Consider misting
criticalLow.description: Humidity at {{value}}{{unit}} is too low for optimal growth.
criticalLow.reason: Low humidity causes plant stress and increased water demand.
criticalLow.impact: Light misting can help maintain leaf health

soon.title: üìÖ Harvest approaching for {{cropName}}
soon.description: Expected harvest date is within the next 7 days.
soon.reason: Prepare equipment and plan logistics for harvesting.
soon.impact: Timely harvest ensures best quality and yield

ready.title: üåæ {{cropName}} is ready to harvest!
ready.description: Your crop has reached maturity. Harvest within the next few days for best quality.
ready.reason: Delaying harvest may reduce quality or cause overripening.
ready.impact: Harvest at peak for maximum value

seedling.title: üå± {{cropName}} in seedling stage
seedling.description: Your crop is in early growth. Focus on consistent moisture and protection.
seedling.reason: Seedlings are delicate and need careful attention.
seedling.impact: Good early care leads to strong, healthy plants

flowering.title: üå∏ {{cropName}} is flowering
flowering.description: Consider applying fertilizer to support flower and fruit development.
flowering.reason: Flowering stage has high nutrient demands.
flowering.impact: Proper nutrition during flowering improves yield

rainExpected.title: üåßÔ∏è Rain expected - Skip watering
rainExpected.description: Rain is forecast. Save water by skipping today's irrigation.
rainExpected.reason: Natural rainfall will provide sufficient moisture.

frostWarning.title: ‚ùÑÔ∏è Frost warning tonight
frostWarning.description: Temperatures expected to drop below freezing. Protect sensitive crops.
frostWarning.reason: Frost can cause severe damage to unprotected plants.
frostWarning.impact: Cover crops or activate heating systems

heatWarning.title: ‚òÄÔ∏è Extreme heat expected
heatWarning.description: High temperatures forecast. Increase watering and provide shade.
heatWarning.reason: Heat stress reduces growth and can damage crops.
heatWarning.impact: Extra care during heat waves prevents losses

about.label: About
about.title: About Feedin
about.lead: Feedin was born from the field, where every decision matters. Faced with climate hazards, water stress, and the growing complexity of agricultural management, Feedin guides farmers with clarity and peace of mind ‚Äî for smart agriculture rooted in reality.
about.body: Feedin doesn't replace human experience. It amplifies it, transforming invisible signals from the field into clear indicators at the right time. Every farmer deserves a clear view of their crops, irrigation, and the sustainability of their practices ‚Äî without complexity, without jargon.

value.label: What Feedin brings
value.title: More legible, calmer agriculture
value.intro: Feedin makes the essential signals of your plots visible so every decision is made with confidence.

benefits.b1: Anticipate the water needs of your crops before it's too late
benefits.b2: Receive clear indicators on the state of your plots, day after day
benefits.b3: Make irrigation and protection decisions at the right time
benefits.b4: Build sustainable agricultural management, season after season

howItWorks.label: How it works
howItWorks.title: Your smart farm in 4 steps
howItWorks.subtitle: From sensor installation to effortless automation, Feedin revolutionizes your daily agricultural work.

s1.title: Equip your plots
s1.desc: Easily map your greenhouses and equip them with our sensors (soil, climate, water). Your ecosystem is ready.

s2.title: Monitor in real-time
s2.desc: Access an intuitive dashboard gathering all your IoT data. Eliminate guesswork, see the facts.

s3.title: Act and automate
s3.desc: Set smart thresholds: start irrigation, open roofs... The system takes action automatically.

s4.title: Supervise and grow
s4.desc: Analyze historical data and make informed decisions to improve your yields season after season.

farmers.label: For you
farmers.title: Designed for real farmers
farmers.subtitle: Whether you grow olive trees or tomatoes, whether you manage 5 hectares or 500 ‚Äî Feedin adapts to your reality.

c1.title: For family farms
c1.desc: A simple tool that respects the way you work.

c2.title: For large farms
c2.desc: An overview of all your plots, without complication.

c3.title: For cooperatives
c3.desc: Support your members with shared and reliable indicators.

impact.label: Our impact
impact.title: Beyond a tool, a vision for the future
impact.lead: Feedin isn't just about data: we want to make agriculture more resilient, optimize your yields, and protect resources by building smart farming ecosystems.

s1.label: Every drop of water and nutrient perfectly calibrated

s2.label: Anticipate and manage everything remotely with certainty

s3.label: Eco-friendly practices that protect tomorrow's soils

trust.label: Trust
trust.title: Reliability and security at the heart of our commitment
trust.lead: Feedin is built to last. Your data is protected, your access is guaranteed, and our team is here to support you ‚Äî today and tomorrow.
trust.body: Whether you are an independent farmer, a cooperative, or an institutional organization, Feedin offers the reliability you need to work with complete peace of mind.

i1.title: Protected data
i1.desc: Your information remains yours. Secure hosting, controlled access.

i2.title: Available 24/7
i2.desc: Access your plots at any time, from any device.

i3.title: Human support
i3.desc: A team at your disposal to guide you through onboarding.

i4.title: Multilingual
i4.desc: Available in French, English, and Arabic to adapt to every user.

i5.title: Simple to use
i5.desc: No technical skills required. If you can use a smartphone, you can use Feedin.

i6.title: Continuous updates
i6.desc: Feedin improves regularly, at no extra cost, and without interruption.

ctaFinal.title: Ready to elevate your farm management?
ctaFinal.text: Join Feedin today and start managing your crops with precision and peace of mind.
